rows.label: qst004101_msg0001
rows.name: Hey! What are you doing over there?

rows.label: qst004101_msg0002
rows.name:
...Ah. So you want to salvage
a Filament Globe, do you?

rows.label: qst004101_msg0003
rows.name:
I did hear that you could get them
at this Salvage Point, but...

rows.label: qst004101_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, it was a while ago now that you
could find them here. Lately I hear
they haven't been showing up at all.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0005
rows.name:
Either there's none left or the
Cloud Sea's current's changed.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0006
rows.name:
Anyhow, it's a prized item on the
market right now. You'll be hard
pressed to find them anywhere.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, I suppose I could let
you have one of mine...

rows.label: qst004101_msg0010
rows.name:
Could you dispatch some
Revenge Tirkin for us?

rows.label: qst004101_msg0011
rows.name:
Some right violent ones have settled
down in the Tirkin Turf, attacking
passersby with no remorse.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0012
rows.name:
Considering the reports
we've been getting, we're
hesitant to approach.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0014
rows.name:
According to the reports, there are
three Revenge Tirkin to deal with.

rows.label: qst004101_msg0015
rows.name:
Report back to me when you're done
with the mission. I'll give you
the Filament Globe as a reward.
